en.title: Dry Food vs. Wet Food for Cats | Pros and Cons Comparison
en.content:
Many people wonder whether to feed dry food or wet food. Let's compare the pros and cons of each.

Pros and Cons of Dry Food

Pros include easy storage, good cost performance, and a tendency to cause less tartar buildup. The downside is its low moisture content (about 10%), so additional water intake is necessary.

Pros and Cons of Wet Food

Pros include high moisture content (about 70-80%) which helps with hydration, high palatability, and lower calories. Cons are a shorter shelf life after opening and higher cost.

We Recommend Combining Both

The ideal approach is to combine dry and wet food. By using dry food as the base and adding one meal of wet food per day, you can increase water intake while maintaining nutritional balance.

zh.title: 猫咪干粮 vs 湿粮 | 优缺点对比
zh.content:
很多人在选择干粮还是湿粮时感到困惑。让我们来比较一下它们各自的优缺点。

干粮的优缺点

优点是保存方便、性价比高，且不易导致牙结石。缺点是含水量低（约10%），需要额外补充水分。

湿粮的优缺点

优点是含水量高（约70-80%）有助于补充水分、适口性好、热量较低。缺点是开封后保质期短、成本较高。

推荐“混合喂养”

最理想的方式是干粮和湿粮搭配使用。以干粮为主，每天搭配一顿湿粮，既能增加水分摄入，又能保持营养均衡。
